Description: I'm Alive Frame
INPUT
{
  message: {
  cyclicTransmissionsCounter: 5,
  frameType: 'I'm alive'
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  
}

---------------------------------

Description: Instant reading frame
INPUT
{
  message: {
  cyclicTransmissionsCounter: 3,
  frameType: 'Instant reading',
  instantMeasurementReading_liters: 475,
  status: {
    batteryAlarm: 'Ok',
    flowDirection: 'Opposite Direction',
    fraudAlarm: 'Ok',
    genericAlarm: 'Ok',
    leakageAlarm: 'Ok'
  }
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  volume: { unitId: 'l', record: 475, nature: 'Instant reading' }
}

---------------------------------

Description: Historical reading frame
INPUT
{
  message: {
  firstInstantReading_liters: 1407,
  frameType: 'Historical reading',
  readings: [
    1429,
    1439,
    1441,
    1455,
    1476,
    1492,
    1509,
    1698,
    1815,
    1919
  ],
  status: {
    batteryAlarm: 'Ok',
    flowDirection: 'Right Direction',
    fraudAlarm: 'Ok',
    genericAlarm: 'Ok',
    leakageAlarm: 'Ok'
  },
  timestamp: {
    day: 6,
    hours: 5,
    minutes: 62,
    month: 4,
    year: 1456
  }
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  'volume:0': { unitId: 'l', records: [{"value":[1429,1439,1441,1455,1476,1492,1509,1698,1815,1919],"eventTime":"1456-04-06T05:62:00.000Z","nature":"Historical reading"}] },
  'volume:1': { unitId: 'l', records: [{"value":1407,"eventTime":"1456-04-06T05:62:00.000Z","nature":"First instant reading liters"}] }
}
